name: Footographer
description:
Version 1.001

Spiritual successor to  my previous game, OC Maker.  Concept is roughly the same, however you unlock more items by performing photoshoots.   I haven't had a chance to put together a "How to" just yet, but for now click around and you'll probably figure it out.

Presently there isn't a save option, but I'm working on getting that figured out.

Also there's been a recurring issue with sprites that mysteriously vanished... If you run into that leave a comment and I'll investigate it further.   You'll know it's happening if your starting character has pure white eyes.

Assuming nothing goes terribly wrong, enjoy!
